channel.title: Books Phone Vacation Apple Ipod Porn Phones Nokia on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Books Phone Vacation Apple Ipod Porn Phones Nokia on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: my room is a mess
item.description: seriously. it is a crazy mess. it just exploded the other day and I haven’t had a chance or drive to fix it. so the ipod mini is incredible. so tiny. it really is awesome. as you can see it is quite a bit smaller than the regular ipod. it came with the crappy generic white apple headphones. I was hopeing for the fancy smancy in ear ones. but noooo… it did however come with a really nifty belt clip.
